--mbx-list-text-color-light.description: List element text color when [dark](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off`

--mbx-list-text-color-dark.description: List element text color when [dark](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on`

--mbx-list-text-color-hover-light.description: List element text color when [dark](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off`, on [hover](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#hover)

--mbx-list-text-color-hover-dark.description: List element text color when [dark](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on`, on [hover](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#hover)
